home.lead: PreKantin helps you order food and drinks from the canteen ahead of time, so your break isn't spent just waiting in line.
home.why.mahasiswa.title: Your Break Time is Valuable, Don't Waste it Queuing!
home.why.mahasiswa.desc: Every second on campus counts. Whether it's for studying, organizing, or just relaxing with friends. But,
home.why.mahasiswa.desc.strong: how much time is wasted just waiting in long canteen lines?
home.why.merchant.title: Increase Sales, Streamline Operations, Gain More Customers!
home.why.merchant.desc: In this digital age, managing a campus canteen stall is no longer enough by just waiting for customers. Challenges such as
home.why.merchant.desc.strong: chaotic peak hours, long queues, and potential lost sales due to limited time

reset.title: Change Password
about.desc1: PreKantin is an early food ordering platform designed for the campus environment. We help students, lecturers, and staff to order their favorite food from campus canteens faster, easier, and more conveniently.
about.desc2: To create a smarter, faster, and more connected campus canteen experience through technology that bridges the needs between students and food vendors. PreKantin is here with a vision to create an efficient, comfortable canteen culinary ecosystem that supports digital development for all parties.
about.desc3: PreKantin's mission is to simplify dining activities on campus through a fast, efficient, and user-friendly digital platform. We strive to reduce long queues in canteens by presenting a practical and organized food ordering system. In addition, PreKantin is committed to empowering canteen vendors with technology that helps them manage orders more easily and modernly. Through this step, we want to create a comfortable dining experience for students while supporting the operational sustainability of campus canteens towards a smarter and more efficient digital era.
